subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Huskies guard Ryan Boatright possesses a defensive philosophy that mirrors that of his coach, Kevin Ollie, and it has made life difficult on opposing point guards.
snippet: The Huskies guard Ryan Boatright possesses a defensive philosophy that mirrors that of his coach, Kevin Ollie, and it has made life difficult on opposing point guards.
